Delicious Frankfurters
Advantages: tastes great, versatile, quickly ready Disadvantages: none
...From time to time I used to buy Herta Classic Frankfurter sausages as my kids like it but I found them too greasy. I eat them without bread in general and it wasn?t that good I have to admit. I used to make some meals with potatoes and frankfurters not to feel that greasy.
While shopping in Sainsbury?s last year my kids spotted the sausages and demanded loudly so I put some into the shopping trolley. I noticed the new package but I haven?t realised the difference. My kids asked for sausages right after we arrived home so I cooked a whole pack for dinner. Still not noticed any difference? I noticed the difference though when I started to cut it in slices as it was easier to cut and the taste?
Price and package ------------------------- I do the shopping in Sainsbury?s and Tesco as there is no other shop in our nearby. I found these...
D_i_a_n_e 01.01.1970 Read review Ciao members have rated this review on average very helpful Review of Herta Chicken Frankfurters
Sheraton Frankfurt
Advantages: not too expensive, room was very clean and professionally Disadvantages: a bit difficult to find, bit far from town
...For a meeting in Frankfurt, I stayed one night at the Sheraton in Frankfurt. The choice this hotel was because its location next to the airport. Since the meeting would take place at the airport, this was ideal.
The room was nice and looked clean. The room was bigger than we had expected and had a double bed and a sofa bed. It had a real Ikea feel to it but in a modern way and very practical so it did lack some personality. What we noticed straight away was the lack of air conditioner in the room and with 25 degrees outside that was a disappointment.
The double bed was comfortable and at both side you have a lamp and night tables. You also have a television, desk and wardrobe with a safe. You also have a mini bar and here you have free two bottles of water. Furthermore, you also had a kettle in the room with instant coffee and tea...
JL132 01.01.1970 Read review Ciao members have rated this review on average helpful Review of Sheraton Frankfurt Hotel and Towers Conference Center, Frankfurt
Holiday Inn Express, Frankfurt
Advantages: air conditioning, good central location, reasonably comfortable beds, good blackout curtains Disadvantages: Tea/coffee making facilities limited, breakfast only a continental, no full English
...Introduction
I stayed at the Holiday Inn Express in Frankfurt City with my brother and this hotel was a really good hotel visit. There were one or 2 dissapointing features about the hotel regarding the service mainly but still this hotel in Frankfurt represented good value for money. Having before visited a few other cities in Germany I took a few days to see Frankfurt. It is the place where the European Central Bank is located and more importantly has a lot of shops across the Old Town part of the city. I also took advantage of some groupon.de dining deals which added extra enjoyment during our visit to Frankfurt.
Location
The location of the hotel is effectively a 5 minute walk to the main train station situated on a bustling cultural quarter. There are plenty of restaurants, cafes and takeaway shops to find a snack...
